channel.title: Need help launching server!
channel.description:
Im running a server under deltascape source my server is called bloodpkrs yesterday i got my no-ip working correctly and i went to www.runelocus.com/?action=statuscheck and typed in bloodpkrs.no-ip.biz and it showed ONLINE but when i tryed logging in it said error connecting to server! well everyone tells my that on the run.bat file its supposed to say Bloodpkrs ONLINE! MINE dosent! can anyone help me!
**note** if you help you can become a server admin on my server! no lie! if you need: my email is: corncake117@hotmail.com

item.title: Need help launching server!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

The Runserver/Run.bat will always say the server is Online/Running, But
That is made say it, You have to Portforward correctly and Enable the port through the firewall,

Do those and your set to set up your own server, And if the server status said it is online,
And others are connecting to your server, But you cannot with that IP, Use Your local server addresses like ‘0.0.0.0’ And ‘Localhost’, Usually server owners cannot login with their own ip, It is rare that they can login with their own IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help launching server!
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Attempt to port forward correctly.

Read full topic
